snippet: The Day: Changing the ban on posters and fliers on public property would help politicians lacking the money for expensive TV campaigns or to pay large fines on a low-cost form of advertising.
abstract: The Day: Changing the ban on posters and fliers on public property would help politicians lacking the money for expensive TV campaigns or to pay large fines on a low-cost form of advertising.

headline.main: The Price in Politics for the Post-No-Bills Law
